entry.title: Today in DeFi - Ren to Sunset 1.0, rETH as DAI Collateral, Intro to Quoll Finance, and More...
entry.summary: Ren to Sunset 1.0 While working on the 2.0, Ren will sunset its 1.0 within 30 days. Ren-assets holders are recommended to redeem their assets to avoid potential damage/fund loss. rETH as DAI Collateral MakerDAO has deployed rETH (RocketPool staked ETH) as a new collateral type to generate DAI. The rETH-A vault has the min. collateral ratio of 170%, a 1.5% stability fee, and a 5m DAI debt ceiling.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Trove Supports Arbitrum Nova, Uniswap Permit2 & Universal Router, Intro to LemmaSwap, and More...
entry.summary: Trove Supports Arbitrum Nova Trove, the NFT marketplace built around TreasureDAO ecosystem, now supports GameFi projects built on Arbitrum Nova, a gaming and social app-focused L2. Uniswap Permit2 & Universal Router Uniswap launches two infrastructure contracts: Permit2 that allows token approvals to be shared and managed across dApps; Universal Router that unifies ERC20 and NFT swapping into a single swap router.
